title: field
description: Contains information about an attribute field.

alias.description: A string defining the field alias.

defaultValue.description: The default value set for the field.

editable.description: A Boolean defining whether this field is editable.

length.description: A number defining how many characters are allowed in a string field.

name.description: A string defining the field name.

nullable.description: A Boolean defining whether this field can have a null value.

type.description: A string defining the field type.
